writing_guidelines.description: Must be listed in the copy. For Country of Origin Requirements, refer to the relevant guidelines.
Refer and comply to the Clothes Captioning: Complying with the Care Labeling Rule guidelines.
Must comply with the Textile Fiber Products Identification Act and the Wool Product Labeling Act.
No plastic product should make the claim of biodegradable or compostable.
Do not make antimicrobial, hypo-allergenic or similar claims without substantiation from vendor.
Do not make eco-friendly/sustainability claims without substantiation from vendor.
Do not make claims that items are organic or made from organic textiles without substantiation from vendor.
Do not make claims that an item will improve or better life.
Do not state that items are made of bamboo; use bamboo made from viscose or bamboo made from rayon if accurate.
Do not use Military. State as military-inspired as these items are not licensed by the military.
Do not use Vintage. State as vintage-inspired or retro.
Lithium batteries need to be identified and called out in product description.
